oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Raw Dataset and Interview Codebook for "Moral Distress Among Consumer Health Information Professionals: An Exploratory Study"
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: O'Hanlon, Robin
Angell, Katelyn
Walsh, Samantha
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Two files contain: 1. Raw survey data collected in 2020 to measure the experience of moral distress and ethical dilemmas by Consumer Health Information Professionals (CHIPS). 2. The interview codebook used in this same study.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Social Sciences
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Erin Owens, for journal, Evidence Based Library and Information Practice
